original_text: Azariah, the leader of the priests, and all the other priests turned towards Uzziah. They saw the terrible disease on the skin at the front of his head. So they quickly took him out of the temple. Uzziah himself was also in a hurry to leave, because the Lord had punished him with this disease.
korean_text: 대제사장 아사랴와 모든 제사장이 왕의 이마에 나병이 생겼음을 보고 성전에서 급히 쫓아내고 여호와께서 치시므로 왕도 속히 나가니라

sentences.original_text: Azariah, the leader of the priests,
and all the other priests turned towards Uzziah.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 다른 제사장들도 웃시야를 향해 돌아섰습니다.

sentences.original_text: They saw the terrible disease on the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 피부에 있는 끔찍한 질병을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: at the front of his head.
So they quickly took him out of the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그를 성전에서 빠르게 내보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: Uzziah himself was also in a hurry to leave,
because the Lord had punished him with this disease.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주님께서 이 질병으로 그를 벌하셨기 때문입니다.
